special_text:
Creature you control enter with your choice of an additional +1/+! counter or a haste counter.
[+1]: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a land or creature card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.
[-1]: You get an emblem with “If a permanent you own would leave the battlefield, you may exile instead. You may play it for as long as it remaions exiled.”
